channel.title: A classic server! (Funscap3)
channel.description:
Hey guys, after reading a thread in Server Development, someone said something about classic servers... And then it hit me!! WTF happened to them all? Ones like Funscap3? HellzEnd!!
The LEGENDARY 317's!! Well, hopefully this is the first download what will bring back the classics!!
I give all credits to my faithful... Google! Oh yeh, and Jayman for uploading :D
Well, i don't think i need to post screenshots as everyone should know what FunScap3 is, so heres d/w link and enjoy!!!
http://files.filefront.com/Funscap3rar/;8303334;/fileinfo.html
~Johno 90% Google FTW! And 10% to jayman heh
Post back or i will remove

item.title: A classic server! (Funscap3)
item.dc:creator: @owner_37 owner 37
item.description:
@owner_37 wrote:

Thanks for this server i like themsort of servers, like back in the day where everyone had those pk server and in varrock building clickin on doors, clicking on hay and dummies to gain experience, why do people want to go on 525 and have exactly like real runescape, then players might aswell stick at runescape, custom quests All this g.e and stuff, might aswell get somewhere on runescape, u know runescape is gona be up for ever but with 508 u dont, and 317 might not be up all time on some but Much better such as pking and things much funner oh yeah, thank you for this Rep for you

Read full topic

item.title: A classic server! (Funscap3)
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:6, topic:276608”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=365271.msg2770746#msg2770746 date=1241116666]
Remove it now, if you don’t plan on adding pictures.
[/quote]

I think people these days are trying to make private servers more like runescape, but it shouldn’t be like that! Private servers should be kept as a 317, where you click boxers for 2 hours to gain a skill!! Then you just buy a set of barrows and try and kill people, not these servers with ‘custom’ items, or quests, it’s POINTLESS!![/quote]

Creativity in private servers became retarded, the modern idea of creativity is recolouring an emote tab name, typing the name in caps and making it teleport you somewhere.

These old sources aren’t stable, and are full of junk.
It lags because it’s not stable, get it?

Read full topic

item.title: A classic server! (Funscap3)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

HA, i run a 317… there are a few still out there. Just not nearly as much as there could be. Alot of people changed to 508 and 525. I personally dont like them because of the such up-to-date maps…

Read full topic
